data.title: War Memoirs of David Lloyd George Volumes 1 2
data.meta_description: War Memoirs of David Lloyd George (Volumes 1 and 2) by Lloyd George, D. and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.co.uk.
data.text:
Condition: Poor. Volumes 1 and 2. This is an ex-library book and may have the usual library/used-book markings inside.This book has hardback covers. In poor condition, suitable as a reading copy. No dust jacket. Date unstated Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item,2250grams, ISBN:

Hardcover. Condition: Good. Lloyd George served as Prime Minster and in other senior political roles during the First World War, these are his memoirs of that period. Believed to date from 1938. Includes several b/w photographs and maps. I-xviii+1067pp. II-xxiv+1049pp. Black cloth covered boards with blind stamped decoration to upper board and gilt lettering to spines. Light rubbing to extremities of boards. Corners lightly turned. Name inside front covers. I-Splitting between title and frontis. pages. Books weigh 2.3 kg, additional postage fee request may be made.

Condition: Fair. Volumes 1,2. This is an ex-library book and may have the usual library/used-book markings inside.This book has hardback covers. In fair condition, suitable as a study copy. No dust jacket. Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item,2300grams, ISBN:

Hardcover. Condition: Good. No Jacket. 2 Volume set. Volume 1 is a second edition, and Volume 2 is a first edition. The boards of both volumes are edge rubbed with markings and knocks. The binding of each volume is secure. The pages of both volumes are tanned but they are clean overall with no inscriptions or annotations. Heavy set, extra postage required unless posted within South Africa. JHK. Our orders are shipped using tracked courier delivery services.

Not dated. 8vo. Bound in original blue cloth with title in gilt on spine. Volume 1 contains appendices and 12 illustrations, including frontispiece. Includes sections on "The Political Crisis in May 1915"; "The War Council And The Balkans"; "The Balkans & The Somme", and "The Irish Rebellion". Volume 2 contains appendix, index and 8 illustrati ons. Includes sections on "Bolshevism Conquers Russia"; "A Great Educational Reform"; and "An Imperial War". Front endpaper of Volume 2 repaired.
